Growth in the poultry industry: The expert's verdict states that the claim about growth in the poultry industry was understated and could not be proven. This aspect was employed to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Citrus exports: The expert's verdict mentions that the claim about citrus exports made by the South African president could not be proven. This aspect was also used to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Eskom as the largest greenhouse gas emit: The expert's verdict confirms that the claim made by the president about Eskom being the country's largest greenhouse gas emitter is accurate. This aspect was employed to verify the authenticity of the claim.
Implementation of the poultry master pla: The expert's verdict mentions that the president stated that the poultry industry had invested R800 million to upgrade production and now produces an additional 1 million chickens every week. However, the industry reported investing R1.1 billion, not R800 million. This aspect was used to verify the authenticity of the claim.
